title: Australia Set for U-Turn to Rate Hike in Break From Global Trend
description: Australia’s central bank faces the uncomfortable prospect of going against the global grain and switching back to raising interest rates this week to douse resurgent inflation — less than six months after it last cut.
content: Australia’s central bank faces the uncomfortable prospect of going against the global grain and switching back to raising interest rates this week to douse resurgent inflation — less than six months after it last cut.
